subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Nick Markakis and Miguel Tejada each had three runs batted in yesterday and the Baltimore Orioles defeated the Toronto Blue Jays, 7-3, to complete their first three-game home sweep of the Blue Jays in 13 years.
snippet: Nick Markakis and Miguel Tejada each had three runs batted in yesterday and the Baltimore Orioles defeated the Toronto Blue Jays, 7-3, to complete their first three-game home sweep of the Blue Jays in 13 years.
